title: Did Colin Powell Make Viral Remarks About ‘Lazy Immigrants’ and White Hypocrisy?
subtitle: Placing words next to a picture of a man is not the same as the man's writing those words himself.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The quote, "I don't want to hear about 'lazy immigrants' from a race of people who enslaved a whole other race of people to do all the work they didn't want to do" is attributed to former U.S. Secretary of State Colin Powell.
